artist: Larsen Design Studio; Jack Lenor Larsen Inc.; Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Various fabric samples all constructed using 'beige malachite' warp. Plain weave sampler of six colorways on beige and green warp. (beige, green, blue, yellow, orange, coral, brown, metallic)
title: Beige Malachite Warp - Development and Sampling
